description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nCoerced Coexistence:
After an enemy {ACTION_attacks}, this creature afflicts it with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}. After an enemy {ACTION_casts}, this creature afflicts it with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}.
name: Ascendant Bell
